import React, { useState } from "react"; function AdminSignup(){ const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password,setPassword] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() let params = { username:username, email:email, password:password } fetch('http://localhost:4002/register',{ method:'post', headers:{ Accept:'application/json', 'Content-Type':'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify(params) }).then((res)=>res.json()).then((result)=>{ window.location.reload(); console.log(result); }) } return( <>
